items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that lets users save their favorite tabs or manually input URLs for quick access, storing them locally for offline use. Using JavaScript and local storage, it provides a streamlined interface for bookmarking and organizing frequently visited sites, enhancing browsing efficiency and productivity.
